ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue, we get to see which cibopath gets to chew the mysterious dismembered finger that appeared in the last issue. Since there are only 3 known cibopaths in the world, Tony Chu, Agent Savoy and some guy in Serbia, odds are pretty good that you will guess who gets to feast on that lovely morsel.
Also, love comes to Tony in the form of a mystery woman who he sees giving a bribe of some sort to a shady restauranteur.
